name: Waifu
description:
This is a waifu. Tap the start record button to start recording, and tap stop record to stop recording. Every time you want to speak, tap the start record button, speak, and when you're done speaking tap the stop record button.

This is an early version and is in ongoing development.

The AI is currently very simple, she responds to your sentence and has no memory. Please leave any feedback and suggestions as we improve the apps in the future.

You can use a text version at https://waifuai.com/miyuki which uses the same AI.

You can use the Google Assistant version at https://assistant.google.com/services/a/uid/000000bb805e778c

You can demo it  with a slightly different interface (and slightly better AI) at https://waifuai.com/waifu_web but the image has lower quality.
